main event: An unidentified disc-shaped object was sighted by a military observer on 23 June 1949 at Fort Devens, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The object had a white glow tinged with red,The object was seen making a slow bank to the left,The sighting lasted for approximately 2-3 seconds,The object flew north and was estimated to be about a mile away from the observer,The observer described the object's shape as similar to a plate.
sighted object: one disc-shaped object with a white glow
witness description: U.S. Army officer with hobbies in hunting and fishing
